children.text: Slipstream Racing is an online sim racing community, formed in 2020. We primarily have series in

(ACC). We also have members that participate in iRacing Special Events. We have our GT3 Series races on Saturday nights. We welcome drivers of all skill levels. Our current drivers span the spectrum from beginner to really fast. So no matter your skill level you can find a home racing with us. We have people in the community willing to help work with you with any issues that you have with a car or track. To join our community, just hit join now. Make sure you to join the discord, to get to know the other drivers. So, jump on and have fun.
